refnamediv.refpurpose: This statement may be used to quiet an instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This statement may be used to quiet an instrument.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: p3 -- determines whether the instrument is muted/unmuted. The value of 0 means the instrument is muted, other values mean it is unmuted.
Note that this does not affect instruments that are already running at time p2. It blocks any attempt to start one afterwards.
